p: The essential oil was extracted inthe Laboratory of Bioprospection and Experimental Biology (LabBBEx) of the Federal University of Oeste do Par√° (UFOPA). It was obtained by hydrodistillation of the dried aerial parts of P. elongata on a Clevenger-type apparatus overa period of 2 h. Prior to the chemical analysis and nano-emulsification, the EO was dried over anhydrous sodium sulphate and stored protected from light.
